title: Woman with tuberculosis to be arrested unless she gets treatment
description: A judge has issued a civil arrest warrant for a patient who has refused to comply with health department orders for over a year to get treatment for TB.

title: Man gets 6 years for $4.2M COVID relief fraud scheme
description: A South Florida man has been sentenced to six years and two months in federal prison for trying to obtain more than $4.2 million in COVID-19 relief funds by filing false loan applications

title: WATCH:  Watch these retirement home residents slay rendition of Rihanna's 'Rude Boy'
description: These ladies understood the assignment when they performed their rendition of the singer's 2023 Super Bowl halftime performance.

title: Baltimore to pay $6M in latest police misconduct settlement
description: Baltimore leaders have agreed to pay a $6 million settlement to the family of a driver who was killed during a 2010 police chase involving Gun Trace Task Force officers

title: After shootings, Michigan State to restrict building access
description: Public access to most buildings at Michigan State University will be restricted at night, starting March 13

title: WATCH:  Rare footage captures wild giant panda
description: An infra-red camera at Wanglang National Natural Reserve in China captured rare footage of a wild giant panda taking a drink of water and then adorably ambling up to give the camera a sniff.

title: Man stopped at airport with explosive concealed in checked luggage
description: TSA officers at Pennsylvania's Lehigh Valley Airport stopped a man from bringing an explosive device on a plane on Monday, the agency confirmed.

title: Buffalo firefighter trapped in blaze that led to explosion
description: Officials say a firefighter battling a large fire in Buffalo, New York became trapped in a partial building collapse and remains unaccounted for hours later

title: Finland begins building wall along Russia border
description: Finland began construction on a barrier wall along the border it shares with Russia. This is the latest development after Finland announced it will apply to join NATO.

title: Norfolk Southern CEO to testify before Senate next week and 'share what he knows'
description: The CEO of Norfolk Southern, the rail company responsible for the East Palestine train derailment, has agreed to appear before a Senate committee next week.

title: Mississippi governor signs transgender health care ban for minors
description: Mississippi Gov. Tate Reeves has signed the transgender youth health care ban into law.

title: Ex-U.S. Rep. Buyer of Indiana goes on trial over stock buys
description: Former U.S. Rep. Steve Buyer of Indiana has gone on trial on insider trading charges

title: New York City to pay record settlement to George Floyd protesters
description: New York City and the New York Police Department have agreed to collectively pay millions to protesters who were arrested, detained or subjected to violence.

title: Shipping companies reach $97M California oil spill agreement
description: Shipping companies have agreed to pay nearly $97 million to settle a lawsuit with a pipeline operator over a 2021 oil spill off the coast of Southern California

title: 'Havana syndrome' 'very unlikely' caused by foreign adversary, US intel says
description: Hundreds of U.S. personnel have said they experienced painful symptoms.

title: Bill to give Biden authority to ban TikTok advances in House
description: The bill allow any president to impose sanctions against any company that “knowingly provides or may transfer sensitive personal data” to any foreign person or company.

title: Sanders schedules vote to force Starbucks CEO to testify
description: Sen. Bernie Sanders is raising the stakes in his effort to get Starbucks’ interim CEO Howard Schultz to testify at a Senate hearing about the company’s compliance with federal labor laws

title: Russia keeps door open on future talks about nuclear pact
description: A senior Russian diplomat says Moscow may continue to exchange information with the United States on issues related to their nuclear forces even after the suspension of the last remaining arms control pact between the two countries

title: Iran's president orders probe of poisoning at girls' schools
description: Iran’s president has ordered authorities to investigate a series of incidents in which noxious fumes have sickened students at girls' schools, which some officials suspect are attacks targeting women’s education

title: Police looking to arrest top NFL Draft prospect
description: The Athens-Clarke County Police Department has issued an arrest warrant for University of Georgia football player Jalen Carter.

title: Man claims rapper Travis Scott punched him at nightclub: Police
description: Rapper Travis Scott is wanted for questioning after a man claimed he was punched in the face at a nightclub in Midtown.

title: Supreme Court hears dispute between New York and New Jersey
description: The Supreme Court is hearing a dispute between New York and New Jersey over New Jersey’s desire to withdraw from a commission the states formed decades ago to combat the mob’s influence at their joint port

title: Man takes airport bus for a joyride before being caught by police
description: The suspect was charged with grand larceny of an auto.

title: Eli Lilly cuts insulin prices up to 70% amid political pressure
description: The move follows criticism from federal lawmakers and advocacy groups.

title: China, Belarus presidents call for Ukraine cease-fire, talks
description: The presidents of China and Belarus have joined in urging a cease-fire and negotiations to bring about a political settlement to the Ukraine conflict

title: School forced to close after donors pull funding over LGBTQ language
description: The school's mission statement has always stressed inclusivity.

title: 3 police officers shot in Kansas City while executing a warrant
description: Three police officers have been shot in Kansas City, Missouri, according to the city's mayor, Quinton Lucas.

title: Slovakia basks under NATO umbrella, sends Ukraine old arms
description: Former Soviet satellite Slovakia has been a NATO member since 2004, but the reality of belonging to the world’s biggest military alliance really kicked in after Russia’s invasion of Ukraine a year ago

title: Taiwan says 25 Chinese planes, 3 ships sent toward island
description: Taiwan's Defense Ministry says China sent 25 warplanes and three warships toward the island on Wednesday, as tensions remain high between Beijing and Taipei's main backer Washington

title: Blinken wraps up Central Asia tour before G20 talks in India
description: U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken is wrapping up a brief tour of Central Asia in Uzbekistan before heading to India for what is expected to be a contentious Ukraine-dominated meeting of foreign ministers from the Group of 20

title: Ruling party candidate declared winner of Nigeria's presidential election
description: Ruling party candidate Bola Tinubu was declared the winner of Nigeria's presidential election early Wednesday amid calls from the opposition for a rerun.

title: Ghislaine Maxwell asks appeals court to overturn conviction
description: Ghislaine Maxwell has asked a federal appeals court to overturn her conviction and 20-year prison sentence for helping Jeffrey Epstein sexually abuse underage girls.

title: 2 law enforcement agencies found credible threats ahead of Jan. 6 events: Watchdog
description: The U.S. Capitol Police said everyone in the D.C. region must ensure an attack like what happened on Jan. 6th never happens again.

title: Domestic terrorism-related cases increased by more than 350% over 8 years: Watchdog
description: Domestic terrorism-related cases increased 357% from 2013 to 2021, according to the Government  Accountability Office.

title: At least 26 dead, 85 injured as trains collide and derail in Greece
description: At least 26 people have been killed and 85 injured after a freight train and a passenger train crashed and derailed in Greece late Tuesday, according to authorities.

title: Vanessa Bryant settles claims with LA County for nearly $29 million
description: Vanessa Bryant has settled the remaining parts of her lawsuit against Los Angeles County.

title: Train carrying propane tanker derails in Florida, no leakage reported
description: Five train cars, including one carrying propane, derailed in Manatee County on Tuesday, according to the train's operator Seminole Gulf Railroad.

title: Fiery train crash, derailment in Greece hurts at least 60
description: At least 60 people have been injured in the collision of a passenger train and freight train in northern Greece

title: Iran can make enough material for nuclear device in 'about 12 days,' US official says
description: A Pentagon official said the time has gone down from 12 months in 2018 when then-President Donald Trump pulled the U.S. out of the Iran nuclear agreement.

title: Student loan borrowers share burdens of debt as states argue cancellation is illegal
description: Hundreds of activists and borrowers traveled to the Supreme Court on Tuesday as the Biden administration defended its student loan forgiveness plan

title: Jury set to visit crime scene in double murder trial of Alex Murdaugh
description: The jurors in the double murder trial of Alex Murdaugh will travel to the site where his wife and younger son were fatally shot.

title: End of expanded SNAP benefits may push Black, Latino communities into poverty: Study
description: SNAP kept 4.2 million people out of poverty since the fourth quarter of 2021, with the largest reduction for Black and Hispanic people, according to the Urban Institute

title: 'Potential lab incident': FBI director Wray speaks out for 1st time on COVID origin
description: The FBI has assessed that the virus "most likely" came from a Chinese lab.
